div.p: I shall not be at home as soon as I expected.
I will not be home for some two week I am well and hope these lines may find you are the same
we have very lasy times here at camp I would like to see you all
I will be at home two weeks from tomorrow if I keep well
we exspect our uniforms this week I have bought my self
I started a letter home last sun day & as George Gavers was coming home i thought i would send you a few to let you how i was
I cannot tell where we will go from this place
No more at present but remain your affectionate Husband
i would like to have a quart of good cane molasses
